name: mcp-mermaid
description: Generate mermaid diagram and chart with AI MCP dynamically.

tools.name: generate_mermaid_diagram
tools.description: Generate mermaid diagram and chart with mermaid syntax dynamically. Mermaid is a JavaScript based diagramming and charting tool that uses Markdown-inspired text definitions and a renderer to create and modify complex diagrams. The main purpose of Mermaid is to help documentation catch up with development.

theme.description: Theme for the diagram (optional). Default is 'default'.

backgroundColor.description: Background color for the diagram (optional). Default is 'white'.

outputType.description: The output type of the diagram. Can be 'png', 'svg' or 'mermaid'. Default is 'png'.

npm.description: Run the server directly using npx.

examples.title: Flowchart Example
examples.description: Generate a flowchart for a login process with username and password.
examples.prompt: flowchart for login with username and password

examples.title: Sequence Diagram Example
examples.description: Generate a sequence diagram showing the interaction between a user, a browser, and a server.
examples.prompt: sequence diagram for user login in browser and server
